paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
create database if not exists wikitrending
    comment 'i.dobrovolskiy hive homework 1 db'
    location '/hdfs/user/idobrovolskiy/wikipedia-trending/hivedb'
    with dbproperties ('creator'='i.dobrovolskiy','date'='16.08.2017');

%jdbc(hive)
use wikitrending;

--show tables

-- 50 bc - 50 ad (-737790,-701265)

select
    tt.token, sum(tt.tcount) as total_tcount
from (
    select t.top_tokens
    from data_range t
    lateral view inline(t.dates.date_range) drs as since, until
    where t.dates.min_date <= -701265 and t.dates.max_date >= -737790 and drs.since <=-701265 and drs.until >= -737790
) t
lateral view explode(t.top_tokens) tt as token, tcount
group by tt.token
order by total_tcount desc
limit 10;

msg.data:
tt.token	total_tcount
roman	107083
battle	45988
war	36189
caesar	31264
rome	30291
han	28480
emperor	27396
empire	22657
century	20370
dynasty	20114

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
use wikitrending;

drop table data_range_hv;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_range_hv (
  wiki_id int,
  wiki_title string,
  wiki_url string,
  min_date bigint,
  max_date bigint,
  date_range array<struct<since: bigint, until: bigint>>,
  top_tokens map<string, int>
)
CLUSTERED BY (min_date) SORTED BY (max_date) INTO 25 BUCKETS
STORED AS ORC
LOCATION '/user/idobrovolskiy/wikipedia-trending/date_ranges.hive'
TBLPROPERTIES ( 
'orc.compress'='SNAPPY',
'orc.create.index'='true',
'orc.bloom.filter.columns'='min_date, max_date'
--'orc.bloom.filter.fpp'='0.05',
--'orc.stripe.size'='268435456',
--'orc.row.index.stride'='10000'
);

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE data_range_hv
 SELECT wiki_id, wiki_title, wiki_url, dates.min_date, dates.max_date, dates.date_range, top_tokens
 FROM data_range;

%jdbc(hive)
use wikitrending;

select
    tt.token, sum(tt.tcount) as total_tcount
from (
    select t.top_tokens
    from data_range_hv t
    lateral view inline(t.date_range) drs as since, until
    where t.min_date <= -701265 and t.max_date >= -737790 and drs.since <=-701265 and drs.until >= -737790
) t
lateral view explode(t.top_tokens) tt as token, tcount
group by tt.token
order by total_tcount desc
limit 10;

msg.data:
tt.token	total_tcount
roman	107083
battle	45988
war	36189
caesar	31264
rome	30291
han	28480
emperor	27396
empire	22657
century	20370
dynasty	20114

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)
use wikitrending;

drop table data_range_hv2;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_range_hv2 (
  wiki_id int,
  wiki_title string,
  wiki_url string,
  since bigint, 
  until bigint,
  top_tokens map<string, int>
)
CLUSTERED BY (since) SORTED BY (until) INTO 50 BUCKETS
STORED AS ORC
LOCATION '/user/idobrovolskiy/wikipedia-trending/date_ranges2.hive'
TBLPROPERTIES ( 
'orc.compress'= 'ZLIB', --'SNAPPY',
'orc.create.index'='true',
'orc.bloom.filter.columns'='since, until'
--'orc.bloom.filter.fpp'='0.05',
--'orc.stripe.size'='268435456',
--'orc.row.index.stride'='10000'
);

INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE data_range_hv2
 SELECT dr.wiki_id, dr.wiki_title, dr.wiki_url, drs.since, drs.until, dr.top_tokens
 FROM data_range dr
 lateral view inline(dr.dates.date_range) drs as since, until;

roman	107083
battle	45988
war	36189
caesar	31264
rome	30291
han	28480
emperor	27396
empire	22657
century	20370
dynasty	20114
